${ModID}:ChongJinJiuCard.NAME: 重进酒
${ModID}:ChongJinJiuCard.DESCRIPTION: 是 ${ModID}:诗 . 消耗 NL 视为本回合上张卡牌的复制
${ModID}:ChongJinJiuCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 是 ${ModID}:诗 . NL 视为本回合上张卡牌的复制

${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.NAME: Draw and Shiv
${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add 1 *Shiv into your hand.

${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Draw !M! cards or gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength.

${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage X{!M!|>0=+!M!} times. NL Gain X{!M!|>0=+!M!} Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.NAME: Two Amount Power
${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength and !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity.

${ModID}:FeiHuaLingCard.NAME: 飞花令
${ModID}:FeiHuaLingCard.DESCRIPTION: 是 ${ModID}:诗 . NL 丢弃手牌中所有 ${ModID}:诗 ，再抽等量牌
${ModID}:FeiHuaLingCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 是 ${ModID}:诗 . NL 丢弃手牌中所有 ${ModID}:诗 ，再抽 量+1 张牌

${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: additional damage. At the end of your turn, gain #b

${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.NAME: Previews and Callbacks
${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Shuffle *Smite{!Upgrades!|>0=+} and *Safety{!Upgrades!|>0=+} into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:NingZuoWuCard.NAME: 宁作吾
${ModID}:NingZuoWuCard.DESCRIPTION: 消耗所有手牌，每张造成 !D! 伤害，然后抽等量牌。 NL 失去所有能力
${ModID}:NingZuoWuCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 消耗所有手牌，每张造成 !D! 伤害，抽等量牌。 NL 失去所有能力，能力参与计数

${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Cool Card Stuff
${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust.

${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.NAME: Startup And AOE
${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Startup: Gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.NAME: Two Damage Values
${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're Vulnerable, deal !${ModID}:sd! damage instead.

${ModID}:XiaoMingSeCard.NAME: 笑鸣瑟
${ModID}:XiaoMingSeCard.DESCRIPTION: 是 ${ModID}:诗 . NL 每有一个 异常状态，每有一个敌人，获得2点 ${ModID}:诗意 NL 可获得 !M! 点
${ModID}:XiaoMingSeCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 是 ${ModID}:诗 . NL 每有一个 敌人/异常/状态牌/诅咒牌，获得 2 点 ${ModID}:诗意 NL 共 !M! 点

${ModID}:XiaoYaoYou.NAME: 逍遥游
${ModID}:XiaoYaoYou.DESCRIPTION: 是 ${ModID}:诗 . NL 获得 ${ModID}:逍遥
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 长河远上,埋骸其下,吾自逍遥

${ModID}:YuNiao.NAME: 鱼鸟梦
${ModID}:YuNiao.DESCRIPTION: 是 ${ModID}:梦 . 造成敌人要对你造成的伤害等量的伤害。 NL 造成 !D! 点伤害

${ModID}:HuangLiang.NAME: 黄粱梦
${ModID}:HuangLiang.DESCRIPTION: 是 ${ModID}:梦 . 获得 !M! 金币

${ModID}:AltDemonForm.NAME: 恶魔形态
${ModID}:AltDemonForm.DESCRIPTION: 回合结束后获得 !M! 仪式
${ModID}:AltDemonForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 立即获得 1 力量 NL 回合结束后获得 !M! 仪式

${ModID}:TranquilityCard.NAME: “清平”
${ModID}:TranquilityCard.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害，消耗时获得 !M! ${ModID}:诗意

${ModID}:FibnarcciCard.NAME: 斐波那契?
${ModID}:FibnarcciCard.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害，下次打出伤害增加 !${ModID}:sd! 点

${ModID}:AltTieZhanBo.NAME: 铁斩波
${ModID}:AltTieZhanBo.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害，获得造成伤害点格挡

${ModID}:AltMetamorphosis.NAME: 羽化
${ModID}:AltMetamorphosis.DESCRIPTION: 向抽牌堆中加入 !M! 张能力牌，这些牌的耗能减少 1
${ModID}:AltMetamorphosis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 向抽牌堆中加入 !M! 张 #b升级过的 能力牌，这些牌的耗能减少 1

${ModID}:Lonely.NAME: 孤独
${ModID}:Lonely.DESCRIPTION: 可被打出。在手牌中时，卡牌打出后耗能增加 1

${ModID}:ZhuoJiuChengXin.NAME: 浊酒澄心
${ModID}:ZhuoJiuChengXin.DESCRIPTION: 是 ${ModID}:酒牌 NL 获得 !M! 人工制品
${ModID}:ZhuoJiuChengXin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 是 ${ModID}:酒牌 NL 手牌中每有一张 ${ModID}:酒牌 ，获得 !M! 人工制品

${ModID}:SwapCup.NAME: 换盏
${ModID}:SwapCup.DESCRIPTION: 选择两张牌，在这场战斗交换二者耗能
${ModID}:SwapCup.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 选择两张牌，交换二者耗能 NL 如果是 ${ModID}:酒牌 ，先将其能耗置为 !M!

${ModID}:ZhiZhan.NAME: 掷盏
${ModID}:ZhiZhan.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 力量和活力在此牌上发挥 !M! 倍效果。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 当年掷盏飞残暮，今宵抔酒对高城。

${ModID}:LinYuanWangShui.NAME: 临渊忘水
${ModID}:LinYuanWangShui.DESCRIPTION: 抽 !M! 张牌，回合结束时消耗所有手牌

${ModID}:DrunkButterfly.NAME: 醉蝶
${ModID}:DrunkButterfly.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 NL 如果斩杀，可无视路线1次。

${ModID}:ShiDuanMengChang.NAME: 诗短梦长
${ModID}:ShiDuanMengChang.DESCRIPTION: 本回合受伤减半 NL 本回合损失生命时，其 1/!M!转换为 ${ModID}:缠绕

${ModID}:TianZhui.NAME: 天坠
${ModID}:TianZhui.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害，记录突破格挡的伤害，获得等量 ${ModID}:伤害增加

${ModID}:PeripateticismCard.NAME: “逍遥”
${ModID}:PeripateticismCard.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。如果血量低于一半，那么 消耗 此牌 NL 消耗时抽 !M! 张牌，获得 !M! [E]

${ModID}:Feature_2_Card.NAME: 随付笺咏醉屠苏
${ModID}:Feature_2_Card.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 消耗卡牌时升级 NL 还可升级 !M! 次，每次升级增加 !${ModID}:m2! 点伤害，减少 1 点耗能。

${ModID}:AltGuangHui.NAME: 光辉ALT
${ModID}:AltGuangHui.DESCRIPTION: 造成获得过的 ${ModID}:诗意 总量的伤害 NL (造成 !D! 点伤害)

${ModID}:Thunderer.NAME: “弦惊”
${ModID}:Thunderer.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 NL 回合结束时手牌加入一张 弦惊 NL 打出后 消耗 尽可能多的同等级弦惊 合成升级

${ModID}:Whoami_Shuo.NAME: 我无
${ModID}:Whoami_Shuo.DESCRIPTION: 打出攻击牌 !M! 次后，下一张攻击牌将打出两次

${ModID}:Whoami_Wang.NAME: 无我
${ModID}:Whoami_Wang.DESCRIPTION: 失去 !M! 点生命值，生成一个黄铜镜

${ModID}:Whoami_Ling.NAME: 无怖
${ModID}:Whoami_Ling.DESCRIPTION: 免疫敌人的异常 NL 得到来自己方的异常时移除此能力

${ModID}:Whoami_Nian.NAME: 无悲
${ModID}:Whoami_Nian.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 缓冲，每打出一张攻击牌，失去 1 缓冲
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 一把设计古朴的匕首。据说只要用来从事谋杀之类的事业，匕首的锋刃就会消失。

${ModID}:Whoami_Dusk.NAME: 无喜
${ModID}:Whoami_Dusk.DESCRIPTION: 选择一个非领袖敌人，使其失去 50%生命，并生成一个 墨魉
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 一支看似无奇的毛笔。夕的笔，可生万物，也可生笔，用的时候要留神一点。

${ModID}:BattleHymn.NAME: 战歌
${ModID}:BattleHymn.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害，给予 !M! 层易伤。 NL 如果存在虚弱，那么抽 !M! 张牌

${ModID}:Lament.NAME: 悲词
${ModID}:Lament.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害，给予 !M! 层虚弱。 NL 如果存在易伤，那么抽 !M! 张牌

${ModID}:ShanHeYuanKuo.NAME: 山河远阔
${ModID}:ShanHeYuanKuo.DESCRIPTION: 抽 !M! 张牌，下回合少抽一张牌

${ModID}:YuGuoZhuoYing.NAME: 雨过濯缨
${ModID}:YuGuoZhuoYing.DESCRIPTION: 受伤后立刻获得等量格挡

${ModID}:SurprisingThunder.NAME: 远山惊雷
${ModID}:SurprisingThunder.DESCRIPTION: 对主目标造成 !D! 伤害，其余造成一半的伤害

${ModID}:ChiJiuSui.NAME: 辞旧岁
${ModID}:ChiJiuSui.DESCRIPTION: 交换你的抽牌堆和弃牌堆，洗牌，抽一张牌
